pages.text: The Alchemical Imbuer is a machine that brews potions. Uses fluid potions as opposed to brewing directly in a bottle. One ingredient is enough to brew one potion bucket, which can fill 4 bottles in a $(l:thermal:technology/machines/bottler)Fluid Encapsulator$(/l).
